inline bool validateSupplyPressure(bool bLeft)

  1. release air

  2. close valves if supply pressure is insufficient

  3. pressure in cylinders will be reduced to less than neglectable pressure

Parameters:

bLeft – which Side to check , true = left side | false = right side

Returns:

IMU - BN0055

Defines

BN0055_H
IMU_I2C_ADDR
IMU_ADAFRUIT_ID
IMU_RAD2DEG
class BN0055

Public Types

enum Error

Values:

enumerator NO_ERROR

default state

enumerator LOW_SIGNAL

SCL pin or SDA pin are low - if so, the line is faulty.

enumerator NO_DATA

no real data is transmitted - if so, the line is faulty (most likely ground wire)

enumerator INIT_FAILED

IMU setup failed.

Public Functions

inline BN0055()
inline ~BN0055()
inline bool init()

initialize the Sensor and set bIMUState correctly

Returns:

true

Returns:

false

  • bInvert –

  • dOffset –

double

class OriginalLucyTrajectory : public RampTrajectory

class ForceReductionTrajectory : public RampTrajectory
#include <Trajectory.h>

FlattenTrajectory -> is not a own Trajectory only other Params acutally no class needed replaces the Force_Curve Function which returns the TargetPoint Force Reduction Trajectory replaces the Force_Curve Function which returns the TargetPoint

Controller

Defines

VALVECONTROLLER_H
class ValveController
#include <Controller.h>

Base controller class that can used to derive a P, PI, PD or PID controller.

Subclassed by ContValveController, DiscreteValveController, NoneValveController, PIDController

Public Functions

virtual double *compute(const double &dCurInput, const double &dCurSetpoint) = 0

Method, that computes the controller output of the current time step for the given input value and set-point

Parameters:

  • dCurInput – current input value

  • dCurSetpoint – current setpoint

Returns:

controller output in the range of min and max output

inline double *getOutput()

Method that returns the last calculated output of the controller.

Returns:

dOut calculated output value

inline ValveController()

default constructor to set dSampleTime from define.h

inline virtual ~ValveController()

virtual destructor to make deleting derived classes from a base class pointer work

inline void clamp()

clamp the output signal to specified bounds

Protected Attributes

double dOutputMin = 0.0

Minimal value for the calculated output.

double dOutputMax = 255.0

Maximal value for the calculated output.

double dSampleTime = 0.0

Sample time of the controller in s.

double dLinInput = 0.0

Linearization part of input.

double dOut = 0

last calculated output of controller

class NoneValveController : public ValveController

Public Functions

inline virtual double *compute(const double &dCurInput, const double &dCurSetpoint)

Method, that computes the controller output of the current time step for the given input value and set-point

Parameters:

  • dCurInput – current input value

  • dCurSetpoint – current setpoint

Returns:

controller output in the range of min and max output

class ContValveController : public ValveController

Parameters Groups in define.h

Lucy

group LUCY

various defines regarding lucy

Defines

EXP_TIMER_ID

Timer0.

sampling time of controller in ms

EXP_TIMER_PRESCALAR
EXP_TIMER_PERIOD

with a prescalar of 80 the period is in µs so 50000µs = 50ms

EXP_DT
EXP_DT_S
M_PI
ADC_RESOLUTION

UI

group UI

various defines regarding the manual remote with integrated leds and potentiometer

PORTS are curently not used

Defines

UI_LED_YELLOW_PIN

pin of blue led

UI_POTI_PIN

pin of poti

UI_POTI_DIR

Pressure

group PRESSURE

various defines for pressure related stuff

Defines

PRESSURE_SENSOR_PIN_LEFT
PRESSURE_SENSOR_PIN_RIGHT
PRESSURE_SENSOR_PIN_SUPPLY
PRESSURE_SENSOR_PIN_TANK
PRESSURE_SENSOR_SLOPE
PRESSURE_SENSOR_OFFSET
PRESSURE_MAX_HARDWARE

maximum pressure before hardware breaks

PRESSURE_MAX_UI

max. target pressure for UI input at 100%

PRESSURE_MIN_UI

min. target pressure for UI input at 0%

PRESSURE_DEADZONE

minimum pressure difference between traget pressure and actual pressure to activate; not essential

PRESSURE_MIN_NICE

minimum supply pressure for system to work as expected; essential

PRESSURE_MIN_SUPPY

minimum supply pressure for system to work as expected; essential

PRESSURE_NEGLECTABLE

in case of insuficient supply pressure, the pressure in the cylinders will be reduced to less than neglectable pressure

PRESSURE_TARGET_REDUCTION

to avoid target pressure being higher than supply pressure due to small short term pressure drops; not essential

PRESSURE_ADJUST_MODE

prolongs open valve times in low supply pressure scenarios; not recommendet with regular 8bar supply

PRESSURE_MAX_CYCLE_TIME

avoiding long unresponsive system periods in [ms]

PRESSURE_MIN_CYCLE_TIME

too fast for valves to make a real change [ms]

PRESSURE_BETA_IN_1
PRESSURE_BETA_IN_2
PRESSURE_BETA_IN_3
PRESSURE_BETA_IN_4
PRESSURE_BETA_OUT_1
PRESSURE_BETA_OUT_2
PRESSURE_BETA_OUT_3
